participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and determined, Emily dreams of a future beyond the farm. She is reflective and values her roots while aiming for a career in law.
participant_1.background: i was raised on a horse farm. my family has raised horses for generations. i dream of moving to the city. i want to be a lawyer.

participant_2.name: Carlos
participant_2.personality: Curious and open-minded, Carlos enjoys learning new languages and exploring different cultures. He often reflects on his upbringing with a mix of nostalgia and a desire for change.
participant_2.background: my favorite spanish word is trabajo. my next language to study is french. one of the languages that i am currently studying is spanish. i also study languages.

content.text: born and raised on a farm with horses
mine raised horses   grew up on a farm
born and raised on a farm with horses
do you live in the city   i am tired of horses in the farm
